casebody.data:
Joseph Michael GUARASCIO
v.
NEW HANOVER HEALTH NETWORK, INC., d/b/a New Hanover Regional Medical Center, New Hanover Regional Medical Center and Bill Creech. No. 165P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 6, 2004. W. Randall Stroud, for Guarascio. B. Danforth Morton, Wilmington, for New Hanover Health Network, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of April 2004 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of May 2004."
